price: Namni sana booda garagale, warri sun isaantu finciltoota.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
